titleStmt.title: Poetical recreations consisting of original poems, songs, odes, &c. with several new translations : in two parts / part I, occasionally written by Mrs. Jane Barker, part II, by several gentlemen of the universities, and others.
titleStmt.author: Barker, Jane.

notesStmt.note: Pt. 2 has special t.p.: Miscellanea, or, The second part of poetical recreations.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
